main event: A report of a UFO sighting involving a glass, rod-shaped object in Long Beach, California on July 3, 1954.
interesting points: The object was sighted for approximately 10 seconds., It appeared glassy and rod-shaped with no visible trail., The sighting occurred during clear weather with visibility of ten miles., A high flying jet was reported disappearing in the same area., The object did not produce any sound and seemed to disappear over the horizon.
